Package org.apache.spark.network.shuffle

Interface DownloadFileManager

public interface DownloadFileManager
A manager to create temp block files used when fetching remote data to reduce the memory usage. It will clean files when they won't be used any more.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DownloadFile
    createTempFile(org.apache.spark.network.util.TransportConf transportConf)
    Create a temp block file.
    boolean
    registerTempFileToClean(DownloadFile file)
    Register a temp file to clean up when it won't be used any more.

  • Method Details

    • createTempFile

      DownloadFile createTempFile(org.apache.spark.network.util.TransportConf transportConf)
      Create a temp block file.

    • registerTempFileToClean

      boolean registerTempFileToClean(DownloadFile file)
      Register a temp file to clean up when it won't be used any more. Return whether the file is registered successfully. If `false`, the caller should clean up the file by itself.
